div.bibl: Naujienos, Mar. 10, 1916. A DAY AND EVENING SCHOOL IN ROSELAND(Advertisement)

body.p: If you desire to learn the English language in a short period of time, attend our school. Here you can begin from the very beginning, or, if you already are more or less acquainted with the language, you may enroll in a more advanced class. Here the classes are so arranged that a new student can find the class he is capable of attending. You will have no trouble learning the English language in our school. If you do not wish to remain poor all your life, learn the English language.
Waitches School, 11045 Michigan Avenue, Roseland, Illinois.
The school is open until 10:30 P. M. daily; Sundays, from 10 A. M. to 2 P. M.
